Description

Concrete class for working with Worksheet entries.

Methods

__construct, getColumnCount, getContentsAsCells, getContentsAsRows, getDOM, getRowCount, setColumnCount, setRowCount, takeChildFromDOM,

Arguments

$element DOMElement | (optional) The DOMElement on which to base this object. null

Return value

Type Description
n/a n/a

getColumnCount( ) : string

Description

Gets the column count for this entry.

Return value

Type Description
string The column count for the entry.

getContentsAsCells( string   $range = null, boolean   $empty = false, ) : array

Description

Returns the content of all cells as an associative array, indexed off the cell location (ie 'A1', 'D4', etc). Each element of the array is an associative array with a 'value' and a 'function'.

Only non-empty cells are returned by default. 'range' is the value of the 'range' query parameter specified at: http://code.google.com/apis/spreadsheets/reference.html#cells_Parameters


Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$range string | The range of cells to retrieve null
$empty boolean | Whether to retrieve empty cells false

Return value

Type Description
array An associative array of cells

getContentsAsRows( ) : array

Description

Returns the content of all rows as an associative array

Return value

Type Description
array An array of rows. Each element of the array is an associative array of data

getDOM( DOMDocument   $doc = null,   $majorVersion = 1,   $minorVersion = null, ) : DOMElement

Description

Retrieves a DOMElement which corresponds to this element and all child properties. This is used to build an entry back into a DOM and eventually XML text for sending to the server upon updates, or for application storage/persistence.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$doc DOMDocument | The DOMDocument used to construct DOMElements null
$majorVersion n/a 1
$minorVersion n/a null

Return value

Type Description
DOMElement The DOMElement representing this element and all child properties.
